name: OGA jam Science Platformer
description:
I am building this game for OGAjam where you use other people's assets to build a complete project.

These are the assets I am using for the Jam:

2D Art: Author: ErisTitle: Sci-Fi Tiles and backgroundURL: https://opengameart.org/conten... Author: MinTitle: Scientist and decorationsURL: https://opengameart.org/conten... Textures: Author: LoelTitle: Coins Pixel ArtURL: https://opengameart.org/conten... Author: wierd_wTitle: Dark Paper PackURL: https://opengameart.org/conten... Sound FX: Author: artisticdudeTitle: RPG Sound PackURL: https://opengameart.org/conten... Author: Luke.RUSTLTDTitle: 10 8BIT COIN SOUNDSURL: https://opengameart.org/conten...
